name: Alien Resister
description:
This is my first ever fully completed game that I made and also the first game I ever published. I'm fairly new to game development and I just recently started doing it more frequently. 

The game is inspired by Space Invaders and was made in 4 days. 

You move left by pressing the a/arrow key left and right by pressing the d/arrow key right, you can shoot with the w/arrow key up. The game is an endless space Shoot'Em Up where you try to get a good high score.

And I designed the game for 1080p. If you have a higher resolution there might be some UI issues.

If you find any bugs or have some tips for me please leave a comment. 

Thank you for stopping by my game and taking the time to read this. 

Sorry if my English is not the best. 

Credits to Garo from Team D-13  for the Soundtrack(Shelf Space) that I used.
